attributes.title: Things that are always broken in Analytics, with Arnout Hellemans & Charles Meaden
attributes.summary: This is a bonus episode recorded live with audience pre-covid-19 at the Conversion Hotel conference in November 2019 on the island of Texel in The Netherlands.
